body: The best anal sex scene I've ever seen. This... This is art!
Okay, this one was really good! Really looking forward to support the author.
@scorpionking426, so you’d rather date a slut who would rather be a prostitute than get a real job. after she had sex on your bed with another guy… you’re one sad man
Poverty is the real evil.She deserves love and not hate.

But for real though. She had sex with another guy on his own bed. She doesn’t deserve saving. While she doesn’t seem like some regular hoe, she is still a hoe. I’m mad he even had sex with her the first time raw. No way was I having sex with her raw nor was I eating her out. That’s way too risky for my comfort. 

While she may be one of the few prostitutes that do it to take care of others close to them, and they do exist, she still got ran through right before this dude’s very eyes. She made him a lookout for her sexcapades. If I was in his position, and I’d never be, yes I would have seen her as pathetic. The most we’d have been would be friends. And even then, that’s a strong IF.
I’m not sure @Cookie Z. Her family is pretty poor according to the rumors. While I myself look down on prostitution, she’s just trying to help them in her own fucked up way.
The end was kinda wholesome, but the girl is a massive gold-digger.

Why is he trying to turn a ho into a housewife? It's believable, sure, but it's not a thinking man's choices. I glanced at the raws for this tank and I'm not convinced it's worth reading. It seems like a lot of stories like this. I understand if people like this, but it's not my thing.
I like the main protagonist's character, he is like a kuudere, but a man. Never seen this type of guy before in anime
The guy doesn't even look like he has romantic feelings for her, he just felt pity but overall it was a good read

Fuck i wanted believable stories then we get one and i didn't like it. "Bitter sweet" she obviously likes him by the end, but if you ask me he came across as having slight trust issues at the end, and i dont fucking blame him. Cos if he doesn't make bank then she will jump ship. Plus he's still a cuck in my book "yes it was before he developed feelings" but she got banged on your bed he jizzed in her ass while you where in the room for fucks sake. "Facts" he's a loser simp bitch. And the sad thing is this could and probably has happened in real life.
I understand what's going on here at least, not the usual circumstances though.
I hope this is the Ending. But i smell a bad continuation on this
I feel empty and enlightened

@The Ahegao God Um...she never had any options. She didn't care for any of the other guys and only fucked them to make money. Did you miss the part where it said her family is dirt poor? This makes the MC her only option and she actually got a respectable job for him.
